text: aur vah to vahee (qaadire muttaliq) hai jisane aasamaanon aur zameen ko 6 din mein paida kiya aur (us vakt) usaka arsh (phalak nahum) paanee par tha (usane aasamaan va zameen) is garaz se banaaya taaki tum logon ko aazamae ki tumame jyaada achchhee kaar guzaaree vaala kaun hai aur (ai rasool) agar tum (unase) kahoge ki marane ke baad tum sabake sab dobaara (qabron se) uthae jaoge to kaafir log zarur kah baithegen ki ye to bas khula hua jaadoo hai
